name: The Room (itch) (JPBarroso)
description:
The Room is a little showroom of Unity HDRP high-end graphics and Blender basic skills. It features the following:

  • High-definition, volumetric, lighting and fog.
  • Post-processing effects (vignette, white balance, cromatic aberration and custom  exposure).
  • A complex network of light and reflection probes.
  • Custom multilayered lighting for a more realistic feeling.
  • IKEA-inspired furniture! you may find a sort of SOLSTA OLARP armchair, a TINGBY-inspired table, a not-quite MICKE table, a BRIMNES/KLEPPSTAD wardrobe hybrid, and both a wireless FADO and a definitely-not-a-BOGSPRÖT lamps. All that over what could or could not be a LANGSTED rug.
  • And a Mistery Skulls' Phoenix Wright sheet. I love you guys! You're breathtaking!

Every single 3D model has been made by me in Blender and optimized for beauty and performance. If you want to see your own works in a 3D environment, give me a shout!

Most textures come from Katsukagi, owner of https://3dtextures.me/.
